name: Alstom
membership: Alstom is a member of a number of associations including, but not limited to: UNIFE, AFEP, MEDEF, Shift2Rail and Hydrogen Europe.
goal: Alstom is a global leader in rail infrastructure and sets the benchmark for innovative,environmentally friendly technologies. Alstom builds the fastest trains in the world and develop the broadest range of solutions in the rail industry,from tramways to locomotives and signalling. The Group employs more than 31,000 people in 60 countries.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
. in the transport field, railway policy, infrastructure funding and financing, and transport and climate.
. in the transversal domain legislation concerning trade policy, IP, R&D and Competition policy.
